statements: SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT trial_name, trial_results FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT trial_name, trial_results FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE trial_id > 3;
SELECT trial_id, patient_id FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE patient_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE trial_results LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT trial_name, patient_id FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY trial_id DESC;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, LENGTH(trial_results) AS result_length FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE patient_id IN (101, 102);
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE trial_name LIKE 'C%' AND patient_id < 200 ORDER BY patient_id, trial_name;
SELECT COUNT(trial_id) AS total_trials, COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, enrollment_date FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT patient_id, trial_name, enrollment_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT trial_id, enrollment_date, completion_date FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, data_type, data_value FROM ClinicalData;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT trial_name, enrollment_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, data_type, data_value FROM ClinicalData WHERE data_type = 'Blood Pressure';
SELECT trial_name, enrollment_date, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM ClinicalTrials GROUP BY trial_name, enrollment_date;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalData WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, enrollment_count FROM clinical_trials WHERE enrollment_count > 100;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT treatment_name, outcome FROM treatment_data WHERE outcome = 'Successful' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE enrollment_count > 100;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_data;

SELECT t.trial_id, t.trial_name, p.patient_name, td.treatment_name FROM clinical_trials t JOIN treatment_data td ON t.trial_id = td.trial_id JOIN patient_data p ON td.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE td.outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY td.treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials
SELECT trial_id, patient_id, treatment FROM clinical_trials
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients
SELECT result_id, trial_id, patient_id, result_data FROM trial_results
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, specialty FROM researchers
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE treatment = 'Chemotherapy';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT trial_id, patient_name, result_data FROM clinical_trials INNER JOIN trial_results ON clinical_trials.trial_id = trial_results.trial_id INNER JOIN patients ON trial_results.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE result_data LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY trial_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, specialty FROM researchers WHERE specialty = 'Oncology';
SELECT trial_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM trial_results GROUP BY trial_id HAVING num_patients > 5 ORDER BY num_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_name, treatment, start_date FROM treatment_records WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT trial_id, result FROM clinical_trial_results WHERE result = 'Positive'
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM research_team ORDER BY team_name ASC
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_results WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment, start_date, end_date FROM treatment_records WHERE treatment != 'Placebo' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead FROM research_team WHERE team_lead = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT findings FROM research_report WHERE report_id = 10;
